about_the_game:
Wound Man is a Macabre Jigsaw Puzzle Adventure

Piece together fascinating, historical images and uncover Wound Man's story.
Featuring fascinating centuries-old artwork from some of the worlds most famous anatomical artists.

The first major content update has arrived! This version introduces Wound Man's Corporeal Quest. Wound Man's body has been hewn in pieces and scattered throughout the levels. Search each puzzle for bits of Wound Man's corporeal being, then piece them together to bring him back to full power. The power needed for achieving future planned quests.

Features:

  • 30 puzzles, with three different levels of difficulty.
  • Over 1000 unique puzzle pieces.
  • Original soundtrack with over 20 tracks.
  • Secrets to discover within every puzzle.

There are different modes for different types of players:

  • Casual mode is intended for players who want to sit back, relax and enjoy the grotesque images and intriguing story line. (~1-2 hours or gameplay)
  • Challenge mode is for players who want to dive deeper into the images and spend more time recreating the artwork. (~2-3 hours of gameplay)
  • Special mode is intended to provided endless replayability with features like random distribution of pieces, game timers and other unique puzzles. (~2-3+ hours of gameplay)

The Story so far...

"Wound Man is a tulpa, brought into existence by humanity’s thoughts. He has persisted for centuries as the embodiment of medical drawings crafted throughout the ages. Initially formed by master anatomists to bestow vital information upon medics, healers, and surgeons, he has become the soul of all nameless medical diagrams of the male form.


His is a tale of woe - poked, shot, stabbed, dissected. He has provided us an indispensable service, but at what cost? There was a time when he could set aside the horror of his circumstance and find comfort in his plight… because of her love. She was a salve to his open wounds. Alas, his love, once a tulpa herself, has slipped from existence due to the creeping obscurity of her artwork.

Wound Man needs your help. You can revive his lost eternal partner with your thoughts. He is counting on your help to collect pieces of her soul and restore her to her former state."

short_description: Wound Man is your guide on a gruesome adventure through the ages. Piece his epic story together while literally piecing him together. Poke, prod, stab and slice away to reveal his secrets. It's a jigsaw adventure! - but not for the faint of heart.
